english.segment1: Enemy familiar friend. My beginning and my end. Knowing truth, whispering lies. And it hurts again
english.segment2: What I fear and what I try. The words I say and what I hide. All the pain, I want it to end. But I want it again
english.segment3: And it finds me. The fight inside is coursing through my veins. And it's raging. The fight inside is breaking me again
english.segment4: It's still the same, pursuing pain. Isn't worth the light I've gained. We both know how this will end. But I do it again
english.segment5: And it finds me. The fight inside is coursing through my veins. And it's raging. The fight inside is hurting me again
english.segment6: And it finds me. The war within me pulls me under. And without you. The fight inside is breaking me again
english.segment7: It's nothing. (It's everything). It's nothing. (It's everything)
english.segment8: It's nothing. (It's everything). It's nothing. It's everything
english.segment9: And it finds me. The fight inside is coursing through my veins. And it's raging. The fight inside is hurting me again
english.segment10: And it finds me. The war within me pulls me under. And without you. The fight inside is breaking me again
english.segment11: It's breaking me, it's breaking me. I'm falling apart, I'm falling apart.
